mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, name, sex, birth, phone_number, provider_type, provider_id, is_active, nickname, building_dong, building_ho, apartment_name, si_do, si_gun_gu, eup_myeon_dong, role, COALESCE(address_verified, 0) as address_verified, verification_date, deleted_at FROM users WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT user_id, email, name, sex, birth, phone_number, provider_type, provider_id, is_active, nickname, building_dong, building_ho, apartment_name, si_do, si_gun_gu, eup_myeon_dong, role, COALESCE(address_verified, 0) as address_verified, verification_date, deleted_at FROM users WHERE user_id = #{id}
